attributes.action: Dissolve current UK parliament ,to ensure an exit from EU as electorate ignored
attributes.additional_details: 3 delays to the withdrawal of the United Kingdom from the European Union. Failure of all political parties to unite around a consensus that honours the referendum and honours their party manifestos.
attributes.background: I am a member of the United Kingdom and thus am eligible to vote in all elections. The 2016 referendum is not being honoured, thus democracy is being undermined. Political differences between parties is hampering efforts to leave.
